params.name: optimizer
params.description: The optimizer for which to schedule the learning rate.

params.name: num_warmup_steps
params.description: The number of steps for the warmup phase.

params.name: num_training_steps
params.description: The total number of training steps.

params.name: num_cycles
params.description: The number of hard restarts to use.

params.name: last_epoch
params.description: The index of the last epoch when resuming training.
